Burbank.Ricardo Montalb\u00e1n Theatre:
The Ricardo Montalbán Theatre (also called just "The Montalbán") is a theater in the Hollywood section of Los Angeles. It has operated under several names, most notably as the Huntington Hartford Theater.


== History ==
The Ricardo Montalbán Theatre is located near the intersection of Hollywood and Vine, on Vine Street between Hollywood Boulevard and Sunset Boulevard, at the site of the former Robert Northam / Jacob Stern estate.
